Description:

Lifeless Planet - indie adventure third-person shooter, 
action which takes place on the devastated planet distant 
from Earth. The protagonist of the game, the astronaut who 
find themselves in the midst of the lost of this barren place, 
to unravel the mystery of an abandoned Soviet research 
station and find their comrades missing due to accident spacecraft. 
In addition, he must try to unravel the mystery of the mysterious 
planet and find out her past and believe in the existence of other 
people on this planet lifeless.

Features:
Leave behind a comfortable and safe planet Earth and go on a journey 
to distant worlds.
Discover the whole planet, which scientists thought of as a new, 
full of life world, but in fact proved to be infertile wasteland.
Check that you have visited here before and other researchers, 
many years ago.
Put aside skepticism and believe in the existence of a living 
person on this planet lifeless.


Features repack
